bucketTitle: Naval Nuclear Propulsion, Reactor Operating Logs:
dispositionText: TEMPORARY:  Retain for the duration of installed reactor core and for 3 years beyond final removal of the last of the core type. Retain onboard minimum quantity required to support periodic assessments defined in OPNAV Instruction 3540.3, Naval Nuclear Propulsion Examining Boards. Archive older paper records to nearest Federal Records Center. Each ship (which has ·a singular core type for an extended period) is responsible for archiving its own reactor operating logs. Destroy 3 years after final removal of the last of the core type.
